spec_data.Name: rubygem-hikidoc
spec_data.Description:
'HikiDoc' is a text-to-HTML conversion tool for web writers.
HikiDoc allows you to write using an easy-to-read, easy-to-write plain
text format, then convert it to structurally valid HTML (or XHTML).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 04:40:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Text-to-HTML conversion tool for web writers
